title: Shams Al Qamar Furniture portfolio website (multi-page, service sections, social media gallery, contact/location)

requirements.text: Create a responsive, multi-page portfolio website for “Shams Al Qamar Furniture” with website-like navigation (not a single slide deck), using the provided English copy as the primary content.

quotes: Make a portfolio for furniture business

acceptanceCriteria: Site loads as a responsive marketing website with a clear top navigation and distinct pages/sections.
Company name is displayed as “Shams Al Qamar Furniture”.
All user-facing text is in English.

requirements.text: Implement a coherent visual theme consistent across all pages (colors, typography, spacing, component style) with an interiors/furniture aesthetic; avoid default/template look. Do not use a blue/purple theme.

quotes: try to make website like pages and theme has shown in the video

acceptanceCriteria: A single, consistent design system is applied across the site (typography scale, buttons/links, section headers, spacing).
Theme is not primarily blue/purple.
Layout and styling look intentional and brand-appropriate for an interiors/furniture business.

requirements.text: Add core pages/sections reflecting the user-provided outline and business information: (1) Home/Title (company name + tagline “Crafting Elegance, Tailoring Spaces” + founder/role line placeholder + contact summary + QR code block), (2) About, (3) Vision & Mission, (4) What We Do/Services overview.

quotes: Company name: Shams Al Qamar Furniture

acceptanceCriteria: Home/Title area includes the company name and the exact tagline text.
Vision and Mission statements appear exactly as provided.
About section includes the provided paragraph content (can be edited for formatting only, not meaning).
A QR code block is visible on the Home/Title page (QR destination can be a site URL/contact link).

requirements.text: Create dedicated service pages or clearly separated service sections for each category, with descriptive copy and media slots: Curtains & Drapes (including motorized curtains), Wallpaper Solutions, Full Interior Fit-outs (residential & commercial), Turnkey Service (consultation to installation), plus additional offerings list (carpet/PVC carpet installation, roller/vertical blinds, parquet flooring, sofa upholstery/new sofa sets).

quotes: create and try to section separately like curtains and drapes ,wallpaper solutions, Full interior, Turnkey service likewise
Sofa upholstery and new sofa sets

acceptanceCriteria: Each service category is presented as its own page or clearly distinct section with heading and summary.
Services listed by the user are all present somewhere on the Services overview and/or service detail sections.
Each service category includes a gallery/media area ready to display images/videos.

requirements.text: Add a “Gallery/Work” area that can display photos and videos, organized by the same service categories (Curtains & Drapes, Wallpaper, Full Interior, Turnkey, etc.). Populate the gallery using manually provided/downloaded media assets sourced from the provided social links (no automated scraping).

quotes: capturer photos and videos from are social plateforms mentioned in the details

acceptanceCriteria: Gallery supports both images and videos (common web formats) and is viewable on mobile and desktop.
Gallery content is grouped/filtered by service category.
Implementation does not attempt to programmatically scrape Instagram/TikTok/Snapchat; it only displays local/static assets added to the project.

requirements.text: Add a Contact page/section that prominently displays the provided email, phone contacts (with names), and location; include click-to-call and click-to-email links where supported.

quotes: phone numbers: 1. LUQMAN DABIR : 971 55 376 7628 2. AIJAZ AHMAD : 971 554897617 3. ABDUL BASIT : 971 52 156 4550

acceptanceCriteria: Contact section includes: shamsalqamar90@gmail.com; LUQMAN DABIR: 971 55 376 7628; AIJAZ AHMAD: 971 554897617; ABDUL BASIT: 971 52 156 4550; and “DEIRA, DUBAI - UAE”.
Email is a mailto: link and phone numbers are tel: links.
Contact info is also discoverable from the main navigation and/or footer.

requirements.text: Add social media links (Instagram, TikTok, Snapchat) in the header and/or footer, using the exact URLs provided by the user.
acceptanceCriteria: Header/footer shows icons or labeled links for Instagram, TikTok, and Snapchat.
Links open the exact provided URLs in a new tab.

requirements.text: Add required generated brand images to the project as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and use them in the UI (e.g., header/logo area, hero section).

quotes: Make a portfolio for furniture business

acceptanceCriteria: Generated images exist at frontend/public/assets/generated with the exact filenames specified in imageRequirements.required.
UI renders the logo in the header and the hero background/hero image on the Home page without routing images through the backend.
Site remains readable and visually consistent when these images are present.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or any files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose them instead).
Do not implement automated scraping/downloading of Instagram/TikTok/Snapchat content; only support manually added media assets.
Keep the backend as a single Motoko actor; do not introduce additional backend services.
nonGoals: E-commerce features (product catalog with checkout, payments, shipping).
User accounts/authentication beyond what the template provides.
Admin CMS for uploading/editing content in-app.
Real-time chat, push notifications, or email sending integrations.

required: Minimal premium wordmark logo in black/gold on transparent background (shams-al-qamar-logo.dim_512x512.png)
Elegant interior-themed hero background with warm neutral tones and subtle texture/pattern (shams-al-qamar-hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
